title: Multiple barriers for micropollutants in nutrient recovery from centrate – combining membrane bioreactor and electrodialysis
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1908-1919
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00063C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Paul Genz, Anna Hendrike Hofmann, Victor Takazi Katayama, Thorsten Reemtsma
The removal of organic micropollutants, metals and metalloids was studied in an innovative two-stage system during nutrient recovery from centrate.
